1.text: Buy a fake blood or create some yourself.

2.text: Pick lighter shirts that will contrast well with the blood.

3.text: Put a drop cloth under your shirt or work outside.

4.text: Use a combination of fake blood colors for a more dynamic look.

5.text: Spot test your blood on a dirty shirt to see how it will look.
5.vid: /7/7c/Put Fake Blood on a Shirt Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

6.text: Hang your shirt on a hanger or clothing line to apply paint vertically.

7.text: Pour the blood from a cup to make drips or add a lot of blood at once.
7.vid: /d/d8/Put Fake Blood on a Shirt Step 7 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.text: Toss a small amount out of a cup at an angle for splatters.
8.vid: /5/5f/Put Fake Blood on a Shirt Step 8 Version 2.360p.mp4

9.text: Drip blood from 2–3 ft (0.61–0.91 m) above to add smaller droplets.
9.vid: /1/1d/Put Fake Blood on a Shirt Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.text: Lay your shirt out flat on your drop cloth or work surface.

11.text: Blot your shirt with a sponge or soft cloth to add texture.
11.vid: /e/e1/Put Fake Blood on a Shirt Step 11 Version 2.360p.mp4

12.text: Use your fingers to smear the blood by hand for a creepier look.
12.vid: /4/4c/Put Fake Blood on a Shirt Step 12 Version 2.360p.mp4

13.text: Dip a cotton swab in the fake blood and use it to add small details.
13.vid: /1/19/Put Fake Blood on a Shirt Step 13 Version 2.360p.mp4

14.text: Use a spray bottle to mist your shirt with fake blood.
14.vid: /c/cd/Put Fake Blood on a Shirt Step 14 Version 2.360p.mp4

15.text: Load a paint brush with fake blood and flick it to add small sprays.
15.vid: /0/08/Put Fake Blood on a Shirt Step 15 Version 2.360p.mp4

16.text: Use a toothbrush to add exceptionally small splatters.
16.vid: /d/de/Put Fake Blood on a Shirt Step 16 Version 2.360p.mp4
